text: state board of education rulemaking federal provisions rsa is repealed and reenacted to read as follows compliance with federal provisions administrative rules of the state board which are adopted under rsa to implement federal law shall take into account the fiscal impact and administrative burdens to school districts the state board shall not adopt administrative rules that require a school district to comply with a federally mandated curriculum or program of study not fully funded by federal or state funds the provisions of this section shall not apply to rules of the state board adopted prior to the effective date of this section
